variable.name: raw_pressure
variable.documentation: MODBUS Input Register Address 0 - Pressure as seen from the sensor

variable.name: raw_tank_lvl
variable.documentation: MODBUS Input Register Address 1 - Tank level as seen from the sensor

variable.name: raw_dispatch_flow
variable.documentation: MODBUS Input Register Address 2 - Flow rate on the dispatch valve as seen from the sensor

variable.name: raw_returnline_flow
variable.documentation: MODBUS Input Register Address 3 - Flow rate on the return line as seen from the sensor

variable.name: raw_relief_valve_flow
variable.documentation: MODBUS Input Register Address 4 - Flow rate on the relief valve as seen from the sensor

variable.name: raw_min_sp
variable.documentation: MODBUS Holding Register Address 1 - Minimum setpoint (as integer, withouth conversion)

variable.name: raw_max_sp
variable.documentation: MODBUS Holding Register Address 2 - Maximum setpoint (as integer, withouth conversion)

variable.name: operation_mode
variable.documentation: MODBUS Holding Register Address 3 - Operation mode, set by the HMI

variable.name: manual_pump
variable.documentation: MODBUS Holding Register Address 4 - Toggle pump in manual mode

variable.name: manual_relief_valve
variable.documentation: MODBUS Holding Register Address 5 - Toggle relief valve in manual mode

variable.name: manual_dispatch_valve
variable.documentation: MODBUS Holding Register Address 6 - Toggle dispatch valve in manual mode

variable.name: manual_return_valve
variable.documentation: MODBUS Holding Register Address 7 - Toggle return valve in manual mode

variable.name: source_tank_flow
variable.documentation: MODBUS Holding Register Address 20 - Source Tank flow rate in KL/h

variable.name: destination_tank_flow
variable.documentation: MODBUS Holding Register Address 21 - Destination Tank flow rate in KL/h

comment.content: Convert raw values (from sensors) to real values in bars
Recirculation Mode Setting valves and controlling pump
Cargo Transfer Mode Setting valves and controlling pump
Manual Mode User has full control and can break the system
Transfering memory bits to actual IO Pump Control
Transfering memory bits to actual IO Dispatch Valve Control
Transfering memory bits to actual IO Return Valve Control
Transfering memory bits to actual IO Relief Valve Control
Preparing to change from Cargo Transfer to Recirculation Mode

Pressure conversion is pretty much straightforward:
Pressure (in bars) = (Raw Pressure - 100) / 100
